text: He imana vali'o! Jadom tusim alaha de raha vica yatara karom, tam cagi tar'ham parakha li'a karom, ki jihara bada tuhanu salama kare. Isa nu iha na kaho ki tu imana vala nahim. Tusim sasaraka jivana da samana cahude ho tam alaha de kola bahuta zi'ada utama vasatu'am hana. Tusim vi pahilam ajihe hi si, phira alaha ne tuhade upara kirapa kiti isa la'i janca li'a karo. Ki'unki jo kujha tusim karade ho alaha usa tom janu hai
